title: How can we break free from our habits and live an authentic life?
first_phrase: In "Oltre la Trance," the author shares insights on how habituation has us living on autopilot, leading to lost time and a life that feels like a blur. However, the author has developed techniques through combining PNL with advanced elements of Hypnosis and Enneagram to rediscover oneself and achieve true freedom from automatic mechanisms that steal our time and lives. The author also emphasizes the significant role the ego plays in keeping us prisoners to our existence. The author's purpose is to help individuals grow, and they offer free materials on their website and can be contacted directly.
content: Soprattutto ho deciso di praticare queste tecniche con una finalità, quello di aiutare le altre persone a crescere e proprio per questo ho deciso di mettere a disposizione al riguardo molti materiali completamente gratuiti sul suo sito http://www.pnl-nlp.org/dn/ e su http://www.neurolinguistic.com Potete anche contattarmi al 348.2213449 (Brano tratto da “Oltre la Trance”. Libro nel quale insegno come andare al di là delle limitazioni temporali)
last_phrase: In conclusion, by practicing these techniques with the purpose of helping others grow, the author has made available many free resources on their website http://www.pnl-nlp.org/dn/ and http://www.neurolinguistic.com. Additionally, the author can be contacted at 348.2213449. Their book "Oltre la Trance" teaches how to overcome temporal limitations and can be of great value to those interested in personal growth and development. With these tools and resources, anyone can begin their journey towards fulfilling their maximum potential.
